meanings.definition: A pair of binoculars used for viewing distant objects.
meanings.sent1: I used my spyglasses to see the birds in the tree.
meanings.sent2: She brought her spyglasses to the game to see the players up close.
meanings.sent3: The detective forgot his spyglasses and couldn't see the clues clearly.
meanings.sent4: His spyglasses were like magic, revealing details he never noticed before.
meanings.sent5: With spyglasses, the stars in the night sky looked brighter and closer.

meanings.sent1: He liked to spy on his neighbors using spyglasses.
meanings.sent2: The spyglasses allowed her to discreetly watch the meeting from afar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to use spyglasses to spy on the birds.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like spyglasses, always watching for any movement.
meanings.sent5: With spyglasses, he could spy on the squirrels without them noticing.
